name: Hampton Bay 3-Light Brushed Nickel Bath Bar Light
description: The Hampton Bay Brushed Nickel 3-Light Bath Bar is beautifully accented by the warm glow its frosted shades provide. The 3-lights emit outstanding task lighting and can accommodate either incandescent or CFL energy saving lamps. Easy to follow instructions make this a perfect DIY project for enhancing and updating the look of an bath or powder room. Coordinate with other brushed nickel pieces from Hampton Bay for a polished look you will enjoy year after year.Brushed nickel finish and art deco design complement many styles of decorFrosted shades provide warm and bright illuminationFor energy savings, use with 32-Wattmax. self-ballasted compact fluorescent bulbs (sold separately)Uses three 100-Wattmax. standard incandescent bulbs or CFL equivalent (not included)Can be installed as an uplight or downlightHome Depot Protection Plan:
